entry.title: {{ITEM_NAME}}
entry.summary:
This entry has one 10 minute video (flv) plus the associated fish detection data (compressed SQL csv), for the date dc.coverage.temporal, captured at site dc.source.
Any published use of the data should include the citation: B. J. Boom, et al., Long-term underwater camera surveillance for monitoring and analysis of fish populations, Proc. Int. Workshop on Visual observation and Analysis of Animal and Insect Behavior (VAIB), 2012. Research by the EC FP7 funded Fish4Knowledge project (257024).
entry.rights:
Any use of the dataset should be acknowledged by: "Dataset generated by the EC FP7 funded Fish4Knowledge project: B. J. Boom et al, Long-term underwater camera surveillance for monitoring and analysis of fish populations, Proc. Int. Workshop on Visual observation and Analysis of Animal and Insect Behavior (VAIB), in conjunction with ICPR 2012, Tsukuba, Japan, 2012."
There are no other restrictions on the use of the dataset.

entry.dcterms:publisher: Institute of Perception, Action & Behaviour (IPAB), School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh
